name: The Chitinous Conundrum
description:
Can you solve the Chitinous Conundrum?

This retro scifi platformer is an entry to Wowie Jame 2.0 with the theme "Intentional Bugs". To make your way through the level you'll need to find and exploit movement glitches as you leap from platform to platform. 

Explore to find the secret ending and activate time trial mode. Post a screenshot of your best time in the comments!

Developed by Brian Humphreys with original music by Greg Humphreys.

Artwork: "Warped Caves" by Ansimuz from the Unity Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/warped-caves-103250

Controls

[A] & [D] or arrow keys to run

[SPACE] to jump. Press space while in midair to double jump.
